sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"技术"之意。
means: technique ： 多指具体的某种技术和技巧。
technology含义比technique广泛，泛指生产工艺、科学技术。

word_mean: ［法］术，技术，操作(法)：任何机械过程或外科手术的具体操作步骤和方法，参见method， treatment， maneuver， table of stains等项

sentence.Network_en: This technique brings life to instruction and eases assimilation of knowledge.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一方法给教学带来了活力，也使知识的吸收变得容易了。

sentence.Network_en: The new technique has been used to identify the sex of foetuses.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一新技术已经被用来鉴别胎儿的性别。

sentence.Network_en: One of the wittiest exemplars of the technique was M. C. Escher.
sentence.Network_cn: 最为巧妙地运用那种技巧的一个典型人物就是M.C.埃舍尔。

means.word_mean: 才能,灵巧,精通,阅历,功效

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, from Latin technicus (see technic)

entry.def: A technique is a particular method of doing an activity, usually a method that involves practical skills.

entry.tran: (艺术、体育等方面的)技艺，技法，技能
entry.def: Technique is skill and ability in an artistic, sporting, or other practical activity that you develop through training and practice.

example.ex: He went off to the Amsterdam Academy to improve his technique.
example.tran: 他动身前往阿姆斯特丹学院去进修技艺。

means.word_mean: 1. a practical method or art applied to some particular task
2. skillfulness in the command of fundamentals deriving from practice and familiarity;

auth_sentence.content: This technique is particularly useful in treating bladder cancer.
auth_sentence.res_content: This technique is particularly useful in treating bladder cancer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This technique is particularly useful in treating bladder cancer.

auth_sentence.content: But the whales have worked out a simple technique.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the whales have worked out a simple technique.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the whales have worked out a simple technique.

auth_sentence.content: This technique is often used in the cinema too.
auth_sentence.res_content: This technique is often used in the cinema too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This technique is often used in the cinema too.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 各种工艺的,多种工艺的
stems_affixes.word_buile: poly多+technic[n.技术, 手法]→n.专门技术学校 adj.各种工艺的,多种工艺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 技术[性]的,工艺的;专门性的,专业性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: techn技术,能力+ical……的→adj.技术[性]的,工艺的;专门性的,专业性的
technology[n.科学技术;工业技术;应用科学]+ic表形容词→technologic
technologic[adj.工艺的, 技术的]+al表形容词→adj.科技的
poly多+technic[n.技术, 手法]→n.专门技术学校 adj.各种工艺的,多种工艺的
techn技术,能力+ic→n.技术, 手法
technic[n.技术, 手法]+ian人→n.技术员, 技师

stems_affixes.value_cn: 技术, 技巧, 方法, 表演法, 手法
stems_affixes.word_buile: techn技术,能力+ique→n.技术, 技巧, 方法, 表演法, 手法

stems_affixes.value_cn: 科学技术;工业技术;应用科学
stems_affixes.word_buile: techn技术,能力+ology学科→n.科学技术;工业技术;应用科学

Sentence.sentence: Bad management techniques will be exposed.
There are plenty of training courses in management techniques and committee work which you can attend now.
Land Usage: Over the last five decades, improved farming techniques and technologies have helped to significantly increase crop yields along with a 12% expansion of farmed land use.
Another aspect of social comparison in the counseling context relates to a technique known as normalizing.
There are plenty of training courses in management techniques and committee work which you can attend now.

means.word_mean: 技巧, 手法, 技术(等同于technic)

sentences.en: Modern medical techniques refine on those of the past.
sentences.cn: 现代医疗技术比过去的医疗技术要优越。

jushi.english: Seven workers have been enrolled to study science and technique.
jushi.chinese: 有7名工人被录取学习科学技术。

jushi.english: The actor has the technique of grabbing an audience.
jushi.chinese: 这个演员具有能抓住观众的技巧。

jushi.english: We must learn their advanced techniques.
jushi.chinese: 我们要学习他们的先进技术。
